nodes.text: Alpha Flight Group, also known as Alpha Group, was a TIE fighter flight group in the service of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

Alpha Flight Group, also known simply as Alpha Group, was a flight group within the Imperial Starfighter Corps of the Galactic Empire that utilized TIE line starfighters including TIE/ln space superiority starfighters and TIE/IN interceptors. It consisted of at least ten members who used numbered callsigns, including Alpha Two, Alpha Three, Alpha Five, Alpha Seven, Alpha Eleven, Alpha Twelve, Alpha Thirteen, Alpha Fourteen, Alpha Fifteen, Alpha Sixteen.
Alpha Flight Group participated in the widespread Galactic Civil War against the Rebel Alliance.
Alpha Flight Group made its first appearance in the 2015 video game Star Wars Battlefront, which was published by Electronic Arts.
